Firefox addins

27 January 2008

Firefox addins

  • LinkedIn Companion for Firefox
  • Firefox Companion for Kodak EasyShare Gallery

    Organizing and sharing your pictures is easier than ever with Firefox Companion for Kodak EasyShare Gallery. Upload photos directly to your Kodak EasyShare Gallery, all within your browser.

  • Wizz RSS News Reader

    A constantly improving RSS and Atom feed reader. It is fairly powerful, feature rich and is well supported.

  • Cache Status
  • Google Send To Phone
  • BugMeNot addin

    Bypass compulsory web registration with the context menu via www.bugmenot.com.
